tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ***** ****** ** ***** * **** ** ***** ******* We have sought her medical expertise for our little girl a few times now. She is affable, compassionate, and best of all, friendly with babies and toddlers, which creates an amicable environment for smooth and effective check-ups. Recently, my toddler was diagnosed with a Preauricular Sinus, and Dr. Tejal’s medication and advice were right on the money. Finding an exemplary Pediatrician like Dr. Tejal is akin to finding a needle in a haystack. With our hands on our hearts, we are grateful to Dr. Tejal for her outstanding care for our toddler.

Thank you,
Shivon, Sonali & Sushant

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: There are not enough words to describe how thankful we are for your wonderful care for our premature babies. It was an emergency c-section delivery with twins at 31 weeks of pregnancy we were rushed to the hospital and the surgery was done successfully and our babies were immediately shifted to Neonatal section. It was a 2 month journey for our babies. Now they are 9 months old and doing great...I really like to thank Dr Tejal Rishbud for their best care and treatment. You are really amazing! We always felt very confident in your care for our babies . Your motivation and compassion helped us through this difficult time in our lives.It is such a pleasure to have you as our doctor to care our babies. Once again heartfelt thanks to Dr Tejal Rishbud.
Very friendly doctor. Gives time to explain the problem and also give simple and highly effective treatment.

We went for my son's vaccination, Doctor checked him up thoroughly and explained diet chart for the baby very well. Recommended for first time parents who struggle and confused about baby's development.
